1{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Code section.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Section
7  ( -- * Section
8    ChangeSection,
9    section,
10
11    -- * Simple scanner
12    Scanner,
13    scanEnd,
14    scanNote,
15    scanLicense,
16    scanLine,
17    --scanLineInClause,
18    scanTextAssert,
19  ) where
20
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol          as S
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Clip      as S
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Token     as S
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Utility   as S
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Pattern   as P
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Message   as Msg
29
30
31-- --------------------------------------------
32
33-- | Select scanner based on section name.
34type ChangeSection = String -> Maybe S.TokenScanMap
35
36-- | Line begins with triple equal signs is treated as section delimter.
37section :: ChangeSection -> (S.InputText -> S.TokenScan) -> S.TokenScanMap
38section change f
39        sc@B.CodeScan { B.codeMap    = prev
40                      , B.codeInput  = cs0
41                      , B.codeOutput = out } = body out cs0 where
42    body [] (O.tCut -> O.Jp '=' _) = B.codeChange (selectSection change prev) sc
43    body _ cs = f cs
44
45selectSection :: ChangeSection -> S.TokenScanMap -> S.TokenScanMap
46selectSection change prev
47              sc@B.CodeScan { B.codeInputPt  = cp
48                            , B.codeInput    = cs0
49                            , B.codeWords    = ws
50                            } = sec cs0 where
51    clip   = S.clipUpdate  sc
52    clipw  = S.clipUpdateC sc
53    out    = reverse $ S.sweepToken $ B.codeOutput sc
54    --toPrev = B.codeChange prev
55
56    sec (O.tCut2 -> O.Jp2 '*' '*' _)
57                         = dispatch out  -- end of effective text
58    sec ccs@(O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs)
59        | S.isSpace c    = clip  $ S.clipSpace  cp cs
60        | S.isSymbol c   = clipw $ S.clipSymbol cp ws ccs
61        | otherwise      = sectionUnexp [] sc
62    sec _                = dispatch out  -- end of line
63
64    dispatch :: [S.Token] -> S.TokenScan
65    dispatch [P.TSection] = B.codeChange prev sc
66    dispatch ts@[P.TSection, P.TRaw name] =
67        case change name of
68          Just ch -> ch sc
69          Nothing -> sectionUnexp ts sc
70    dispatch ts    = sectionUnexp ts sc
71
72sectionUnexp :: [S.Token] -> S.TokenScanMap
73sectionUnexp ts sc@B.CodeScan { B.codeInput = cs } = B.codeUpdate "" tok sc where
74    tok  = S.unknownToken cp cs $ Msg.unexpSect help
75    cp | null ts    = B.codeInputPt sc
76       | otherwise  = B.getCP $ head ts
77    help = [ "=== rel      for relational calculation"
78           , "=== note     for commentary section"
79           , "=== license  for license section"
80           , "=== end      for ending of input" ]
81
82
83-- --------------------------------------------  Simple sections
84
85-- | Token scanner.
86type Scanner = ChangeSection -> S.TokenScanMap
87
88-- | Scan tokens in @end@ section.
89scanEnd :: Scanner
90scanEnd _ sc@B.CodeScan { B.codeInput = cs } = comment cs sc
91
92-- | Scan tokens in @note@ section.
93scanNote :: Scanner
94scanNote change sc = section change (`comment` sc) sc
95
96comment :: S.InputText -> S.TokenScanMap
97comment cs sc
98    | O.tIsEmpty cs = sc
99    | otherwise     = B.codeUpdate "" tok sc
100    where tok = S.TComment (B.getCP sc) cs
101
102-- | Scan tokens in @license@ section.
103scanLicense :: Scanner
104scanLicense = scanLine S.TextLicense
105
106-- | Scan entire line as text.
107scanLine :: S.TextForm -> Scanner
108scanLine form change sc = section change text sc where
109    text cs | O.tIsEmpty cs = sc
110            | otherwise     = let tok = S.TText (B.getCP sc) form cs
111                              in B.codeUpdate "" tok sc
112
113scanLineInClause :: S.TextForm -> Scanner
114scanLineInClause form change sc = section change text sc where
115    text cs@(O.tCut -> O.Jp c _)
116        | S.isSpace c = S.clipUpdate sc $ S.clipSpace (B.getCP sc) cs
117        | B.isBol sc  = B.codeScanRestore sc
118        | otherwise   = let tok = S.TText (B.getCP sc) form cs
119                        in B.codeUpdate "" tok sc
120    text _ = sc
121
122-- | Section for @koshu-text-assert@ command.
123scanTextAssert :: Scanner
124scanTextAssert change sc = section change text sc where
125    cp = B.getCP sc
126    raw = S.TText cp S.TextRaw
127
128    text ccs@(O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs)
129        | S.isSpace c  = S.clipUpdate  sc $ S.clipSpace cp ccs
130        | c == '|'     = S.clipUpdate  sc $ S.clipBar cp cs
131        | c == ':'     = B.codeChange (scanLineInClause S.TextRaw change)
132                           $ B.codeScanSave $ S.clipUpdate sc (cs, raw [c])
133        | otherwise    = case S.clipSymbol cp (B.codeWords sc) ccs of
134                           (ws', _, P.TRaw "") ->
135                               S.clipUpdateC sc (ws', cs, raw [c])
136                           sym -> S.clipUpdateC sc sym
137    text _ = sc
138
